articles.author: Reuters
articles.title: Biden's 2024 bid at risk: Arab, Muslim-Americans upset over Israel support - Hindustan Times
articles.description: Many Arab Americans are upset Biden has not pushed for any humanitarian ceasefire even as Palestinians are killed fleeing Israel's bombardment | World News
articles.content: Arab and Muslim Americans and their allies are criticizing President Joe Biden's response to the Israel-Hamas war, asking him to do more to prevent a humanitarian crisis in Gaza or risk losing their … [+5878 chars]
